page.title: 02Such an area of contrasts
page.content: Whoever defined the limit for block 05040432 could not possibly have known how disparate a pattern would be revealed. To the extreme south west is the extremely affluent village of Cottingham, much sought after by home owners looking to higher value property in pleasant surroundings. From ancient beginnings, and with seemingly{no planning,}a self- contained community has grown up. To the extreme east and north east of the region two phases of{planned}council estate building have resulted in the growth of communities which are far from self-contained. The North Hull and Orchard Park Estates have their linkages with the City Centre ensured by expensive bus routes. Yet, to be fair, houses on these two vast estates were eagerly sought after in their early years by people in older houses.
